title: Why Wait? Watch the Story of Off-Road Pro Ryan Standish’s Kokopelli-White Rim FKT Attempt
content:
The FKT attempt was one thing. The bigger thing was riding in honor of his dad Doug who lives with Multiple Sclerosis.

Read the full article at Why Wait? Watch the Story of Off-Road Pro Ryan Standish’s Kokopelli-White Rim FKT Attempt on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
